meanings.definition: Dermestids: a type of beetle known for feeding on dry animal or plant material
meanings.sent1: The dermestids were found in the old books, eating away at the pages.
meanings.sent2: I saw dermestids crawling on the dead leaves in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The dermestids threw a party on the dusty shelf, munching on the forgotten snacks.
meanings.sent4: The dermestids worked tirelessly, cleaning up the decaying wood like tiny janitors.
meanings.sent5: The dermestids scurried around the attic, leaving a trail of destruction behind them.

meanings.definition: Dermestids: the larvae of these beetles, often used in taxidermy to clean bones
meanings.sent1: The taxidermist carefully placed the dermestids on the skeleton to remove any remaining flesh.
meanings.sent2: The dermestids wriggled around the bones, cleaning them thoroughly.
meanings.sent3: The dermestids threw a bone-cleaning party, leaving the skeleton spotless.
meanings.sent4: The dermestids were bone-cleaning artists, leaving behind perfectly polished bones.
meanings.sent5: The dermestids devoured the flesh, leaving only clean, white bones behind.

meanings.definition: Dermestids: a common pest in homes and museums, known for damaging stored food and textiles
meanings.sent1: The dermestids invaded the pantry, ruining all the stored grains.
meanings.sent2: The museum staff had to deal with dermestids infesting the historical textiles.
meanings.sent3: The dermestids had a feast on the woolen sweaters, turning them into Swiss cheese.
meanings.sent4: The dermestids were like tiny wrecking balls, destroying everything in their path.
meanings.sent5: The dermestids left a trail of destruction in the museum, munching on everything in sight.
